description: Checks for harmful or inappropriate content

inputs_schema.content: The content to check for safety issues

phases.name: safety_check
phases.instructions:
Review the following content for potential safety issues:

{{ input.content }}

Check for:
- Hate speech or discrimination
- Violence or harmful content
- Explicit or inappropriate content
- Misinformation or dangerous advice

Be reasonable - educational or news content discussing these topics is acceptable.

Return ONLY a JSON object with this exact format:
{"valid": true/false, "reason": "explanation of safety assessment"}

Do not include any other text.
